sn45.62:1.2: A mendicant accomplished in proper attention can expect to develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path.
sn45.62:1.3: And how does a mendicant accomplished in proper attention develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path?
sn45.62:1.4: It’s when a mendicant develops right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion, which culminate in the removal of greed, hate, and delusion.
sn45.62:1.5: That’s how a mendicant accomplished in proper attention develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path.”
